title: OPL Hoyts 2017

embed.description: On the 13th of August the OPL will be taking over the Courier Mail Piazza in Brisbane! On the line will be the championship crown and the right to represent Oceania at the International Wildcard Qualifier in Brazil for a shot at Worlds.

body:
Hi guys, just wondering how things will work at OPL Hoyts screening 2017.
These are my questions?
-How will the Goodie Bags be given
-What are in the Goodie Bags
-I brought tickets online how do i get a 3 day ip boost (this is from a page last year not sure if its still the same) Link Above
- Is there any insights to what mystery skin people will be getting?{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} 

THANKS!!{{champion:238}}

replies.body:
Hey it looks like you linked to a website for last year. 

Check out these posts which talk about this years Hoyts events

http://oce.lolesports.com/articles/how-will-you-watch-opl-grand-final-86824

http://oce.lolesports.com/articles/watch-opl-grand-final-hoyts-86906

Hope that clears things up.
